name: Phagocytes
description:
--A Fun Endless Runner Game By CyborgCity--

Hello! Welcome to the Phagocytes download page.

The aim of this game is to dodge all the viruses and bacteria. Collect hearts and coins! Buy characters and unlock new levels. Can you beat all the modes? A tutorial about the game mechanics is provided in the game.

Phagocytes is my first game made in unity. This game will receive many major updates in the future. I hope to push this game to the play store and app store.
Please leave your game suggestions and other features to be implemented. Some of the updates that i surely will implement are power ups and injections to shoot down some enemies. 

Phagoctes was made using the Unity Engine 2019.3 .9f1 Personal.
The players, backgrounds, enemies of Phagocytes are made using Autodesk Sketchbook and Gimp.
The image which portrays the speed of a particular character found in the shop menu of Phagocytes is from: https://www.iconfinder.com/icons/1034366/fast_speed_stopwatch_timer_icon .

The fonts which I used:-

Roboto : https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto
Funky Muskrat : https://www.dafont.com/funky-muskrat.font
Dimbo Regular : https://www.dafont.com/dimbo.font
Planet Benson : https://www.dafont.com/planet-benson.font

The Theme Song for Phagocytes created in: https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker .

The Coin pickup sound for Phagocytes is from: https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341695/ .
The Game Over sound for Phagocytes: http://soundbible.com/1830-Sad-Trombone.html .
The Heart pickup sound effect is from :  https://www.zapsplat.com .

The desktop installer for Phagocytes was created using InnoSetup.

Your feedback would be really appreciated. Thank you and stay awesome!
